definition: to beat against the shore (of waves)
to pat/to clap/to slap/to swat/to take (a photo)/to shoot (a film)/racket (sports)/beat (music)

sentences.english: It was the low thunder of the surf on the shore.
sentences.chinese: 這是拍岸浪發出的低沉的轟鳴聲。

sentences.english: We could hear across a little strip of land the pounding of the surf.
sentences.chinese: 一小條狹長陸地那邊傳來浪花拍岸的聲音。

sentences.english: It is a sound that is as common as the crashing waves.
sentences.chinese: 在海灘上，這叫聲就和海浪拍岸的聲音一樣正常。

sentences.english: The waves thunder upon the shore.
The teahouse facing the sea is but the best place to enjoy sunset and ocean wave.
sentences.chinese: 臨海的茶座，則是欣賞日落及濤聲拍岸的好地方。

sentences.english: The surf's roar was here dulled .
sentences.chinese: 拍岸浪的咆哮聲在這兒略爲低沉。

sentences.english: A sea filled pool with crashing surf.
sentences.chinese: 一個由拍岸驚濤注滿的海池。

sentences.english: Surf action on coastal areas has produced other quantities.
sentences.chinese: 拍岸浪對海岸地區的作用產生了另一些數量的物質。

sentences.english: My heart, with its lapping waves of song.
sentences.chinese: 我的心，和着波浪拍岸的歌聲。

definition: spray/ocean spray/spindrift/fig. happenings from one's life/CL:朵[duo3]
